item.title: DynamicCity: Large-Scale LiDAR Generation from Dynamic Scenes
item.description: DynamicCity generates high-quality, large-scale 4D LiDAR scenes from dynamic environments, enabling diverse downstream applications.

item.title: Lightweight Neural App Control
item.description: LiMAC, a novel mobile app control architecture, boosts action accuracy by up to 42% and speeds up execution 30 times using a lightweight transformer and fine-tuned VLM.

item.title: MIA-DPO: Multi-Image Augmented Direct Preference Optimization For Large Vision-Language Models
item.description: MIA-DPO efficiently aligns large vision-language models with human preferences on multi-image tasks, significantly boosting performance while maintaining single-image capabilities.

item.title: Scalable Ranked Preference Optimization for Text-to-Image Generation
item.description: Researchers created a scalable method for training text-to-image models using synthetically generated ranked preferences, improving both image quality and prompt adherence.

item.title: Scaling Diffusion Language Models via Adaptation from Autoregressive Models
item.description: Scaling text diffusion models is achieved via adapting pre-trained autoregressive models, resulting in competitive performance on various benchmarks.

item.title: TP-Eval: Tap Multimodal LLMs' Potential in Evaluation by Customizing Prompts
item.description: TP-Eval enhances MLLM evaluation by customizing prompts for each model, reducing bias and revealing true capabilities previously hidden by prompt sensitivity.

item.title: WorldSimBench: Towards Video Generation Models as World Simulators
item.description: WorldSimBench: A dual evaluation framework for video generation models, assessing visual quality and action consistency in embodied scenarios.

item.title: LongVU: Spatiotemporal Adaptive Compression for Long Video-Language Understanding
item.description: LongVU efficiently processes hour-long videos for video-language understanding by adaptively compressing spatiotemporal redundancies, surpassing existing methods.

item.title: LVSM: A Large View Synthesis Model with Minimal 3D Inductive Bias
item.description: LVSM: A revolutionary transformer-based model for novel view synthesis that outperforms existing methods by minimizing 3D inductive bias, achieving superior quality and scalability.

item.title: M-RewardBench: Evaluating Reward Models in Multilingual Settings
item.description: M-REWARDBENCH, a new multilingual benchmark, reveals significant performance gaps in reward models across languages, highlighting the need for improved multilingual alignment in LLMs.

item.title: ARKit LabelMaker: A New Scale for Indoor 3D Scene Understanding
item.description: ARKit LabelMaker creates the largest real-world 3D dataset with dense semantic annotations, boosting 3D scene understanding models’ performance.

item.title: MedINST: Meta Dataset of Biomedical Instructions
item.description: MedINST, a massive biomedical instruction dataset with 133 tasks and 7M samples, boosts LLM cross-task generalization in medical analysis.

item.title: Steering Your Generalists: Improving Robotic Foundation Models via Value Guidance
item.description: Boosting robot performance, Value-Guided Policy Steering (V-GPS) re-ranks actions from generalist policies using a value function, significantly improving task success across multiple robots and polic…
